meanings.sent1: The cup was brimfully filled with water.
meanings.sent2: The jar was brimfully packed with candies.
meanings.sent3: The suitcase was brimfully stuffed with clothes for the trip.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was brimfully overflowing with joy.
meanings.sent5: The room was brimfully decorated for the party.

meanings.definition: To fill something to the brim.
meanings.sent1: She brimfully poured the milk into the glass.
meanings.sent2: He brimfully loaded the truck with boxes.
meanings.sent3: The chef brimfully topped the cake with frosting.
meanings.sent4: The gardener brimfully watered the plants in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The students brimfully filled their notebooks with notes.
